column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

I reduced the sizes of space on the EC2 and I lowered the instances of the RDS dbs. I honestly believe that the 4cpu and 15 GB of RAM should be enough to handle 50000 users. Especially with autoscaling and backups in place
